modules.serial_labware.JULABO_CF41 package¶

Submodules¶

modules.serial_labware.JULABO_CF41.JULABO_CF41 module¶

:mod:”JULABO_CF41” – API for Julabo CF41 remote controllable recirculation chiller¶

  1. 2017 The Cronin Group, University of Glasgow

This provides a python class for the Julabo CF41 recirculation chiller. Command implementation is based on the manual version 1.951.4871-V3 downloaded from the Julabo homepage. Nota bene: the chiller needs a null modem cable!

For style guide used see http://xkcd.com/1513/

class modules.serial_labware.JULABO_CF41.JULABO_CF41.JULABOCF41(port=None, device_name=None, connect_on_instantiation=False, soft_fail_for_testing=False)[source]¶

Bases: SerialDevice.serial_labware.SerialDevice

This provides a python class for the JULABO CF41 chiller

get_temperature()[source]¶

Reads the current temperature of the bath

set_cooling_power(cooling_power=100)[source]¶

Sets the target temperature of the chiller by default using first setpoint parameter

Parameters:cooling_power (int) – Desired cooling power in % (range 0..100)
set_temperature(temp, setpoint=0)[source]¶

Sets the target temperature of the chiller by default using first setpoint parameter

Parameters:
  • temp (float) – Temperature setpoint
  • setpoint (int) – Which of the three distinct setpoints (0..2) is to be set
